title: Haydee 3
description:
Haydee III is the long-awaited sequel in the Haydee series, which will connect the story of the first and second games. As before, it features a heroine trapped in a facility filled with secrets , traps, and foes. Six new themed zones will immerse you in a profound sense of being lost, doomed, and desperate. Draw your pistols and screwdrivers, and clear your pockets out of junk. A new challenge awaits! Mortal Kombat X
And also mods, an editor, and the ability to climb on crates. Good luck

system_requirements.Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
